title: Rami Chuene’s daughter is selling her nudes to pay for culinary school – and her mom is super supportive!
text:
While most women get judged and ridiculed for using their sexuality to make an income, actress Rami Chuene is rallying behind her daughter.

While most women get judged and ridiculed for using their sexuality to make an income, actress Rami Chuene is rallying behind her daughter who is trying to raise funds for culinary school by selling her nudes online.

In a tweet, Rami’s daughter, Nthateng shared a link to her OnlyFans account which is an international social media service where users can run a subscription content service where they can sell or buy content(usually nudes) to their subscribers.

“Y’all. #CoochieForACause https://onlyfans.com/letty08,” she wrote.

According to Pink News UK , the Only Fans app which was launched in 2018 is popular amongst porn stars and webcam girls who offer adult entertainment. However, the site can be used by any regular person too.

“As far as we’re concerned, if you use social media and produce your own content, you should be using OnlyFans. Whether you’re uploading tutorials, tips, behind-the-scenes footage or just endless selfies, a lot of your followers would be willing to pay for them,” the company reportedly told the publication.

In a separate tweet, Nthateng explained that she was resorting to this method to raise money for culinary school.

“Pay for my culinary school fees sis some of us are just trying to do what we can with what we have. And my mom knows nudes have been my thing for years FOR FREE here,” she explained.

And even though Rami has received backlash from a few people, she stood her ground and said she’s do anything for her children.

“For my kids? I’d f*ck ish up,” she wrote.

And most tweeps were impressed and praised Rami for being behind her daughter’s unpopular business venture.

Rami’s daughter is not the first South African woman to go public about using her body to make money off the app, a few weeks ago, popular Twitter user, @OddeOmontle was celebrated after sharing her account details and asking people to subscribe to her account.

“Please subscribe to my OnlyFans account. I’m giving a discount to a limited people... expires on the 18th. OnlyFans.com/Supacindy ,” she wrote.
description: While most women get judged and ridiculed for using their sexuality to make an income, actress Rami Chuene is rallying behind her daughter.
